sql.search: SELECT main.uid ,main.company_no ,main.company_name ,main.organization_no ,main.registered_province_uid ,province.region_name registered_province_name ,main.registered_city_uid ,city.region_name registered_city_name ,main.registered_area_uid ,area.region_name registered_area_name ,main.registered_address ,main.establishment_date ,main.settling_date ,main.registered_capital ,main.base_uid ,base.base_name ,main.company_principal ,main.principal_phone ,main.principal_mail ,main.contact_person ,main.contact_phone ,main.contact_mail ,main.lease_area ,main.office_address ,main.office_postal_code ,main.registration_type_cd ,main.high_tech_type ,main.industry_category ,main.professional_technical_cd ,main.website ,main.incubation_state_cd ,main.graduation_no ,main.main_product ,main.station_counts ,main.station_position ,main.remark ,main.insert_user ,main.update_user ,main.insert_date ,main.update_date ,main.record_status ,DEMO_001.sub_name registration_type_name ,DEMO_002.sub_name professional_technical_name ,DEMO_003.sub_name incubation_state_name ,characteristics.sub_cd enterprise_characteristics ,characteristics.sub_name enterprise_characteristics_name ,market.sub_cd market_classification ,market.sub_name market_classification_name ,insert_user.user_name insert_user_name ,update_user.user_name update_user_name FROM demo_company_information main LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary DEMO_001 ON DEMO_001.record_status = 1 AND DEMO_001.main_cd = 'DEMO_001' AND DEMO_001.sub_cd = main.registration_type_cd LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary DEMO_002 ON DEMO_002.record_status = 1 AND DEMO_002.main_cd = 'DEMO_002' AND DEMO_002.sub_cd = main.professional_technical_cd LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary DEMO_003 ON DEMO_003.record_status = 1 AND DEMO_003.main_cd = 'DEMO_003' AND DEMO_003.sub_cd = main.incubation_state_cd LEFT JOIN cmn_region province ON province.record_status = 1 AND province.uid = main.registered_province_uid LEFT JOIN cmn_region city ON city.record_status = 1 AND city.uid = main.registered_city_uid LEFT JOIN cmn_region area ON area.record_status = 1 AND area.uid = main.registered_area_uid LEFT JOIN demo_base_info base ON base.record_status = 1 AND base.uid = main.base_uid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(t.sub_cd) sub_cd, GROUP_CONCAT(DEMO_005.sub_name) sub_name, t.company_uid FROM demo_company_attribute_details t LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary DEMO_005 ON DEMO_005.record_status = 1 AND DEMO_005.main_cd = 'DEMO_005' AND DEMO_005.sub_cd = t.sub_cd WHERE t.record_status = 1 AND t.main_cd ='01' GROUP BY t.company_uid ) characteristics ON characteristics.company_uid = main.uid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(t.sub_cd) sub_cd, GROUP_CONCAT(DEMO_006.sub_name) sub_name, t.company_uid FROM demo_company_attribute_details t LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary DEMO_006 ON DEMO_006.record_status = 1 AND DEMO_006.main_cd = 'DEMO_006' AND DEMO_006.sub_cd = t.sub_cd WHERE t.record_status = 1 AND t.main_cd ='02' GROUP BY t.company_uid ) market ON market.company_uid = main.uid LEFT JOIN sys_user insert_user ON insert_user.uid = main.insert_user LEFT JOIN sys_user update_user ON update_user.uid = main.update_user WHERE main.record_status = 1 ${dynamicCondition}
